solution_line_template: The total percentage the class needs to get is {required_total_score_sum} because {total_students} x {target_average_score_decimal} = <<{total_students}*{target_average_score_decimal}={required_total_score_sum}>>{required_total_score_sum}
The total percentage the class has absent the one student is <<{current_total_score_sum}={current_total_score_sum}>>{current_total_score_sum}

The lowest the absent student can get and still have a pizza party is {lowest_grade_absent_student_percent}% because ({required_total_score_sum}-{current_total_score_sum})x {percent_conversion_factor} = <<({required_total_score_sum}-{current_total_score_sum})*{percent_conversion_factor}={lowest_grade_absent_student_percent}>>{lowest_grade_absent_student_percent}
